CustomField.description: For new Customer, Contract can only be presented if user requests for New Account Type on Proposal.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(APT_Manual_Contract__c=TRUE, NOT(INCLUDES(Included_Product_Lines__c,'Workforce Verification'))), HYPERLINK("/apex/AdobeSignApttus?Id="&Id&"&keyContact="&Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.KeyContact__c&"&ownerId="&Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.OwnerId, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__eSignature","Send For eSignatures"), "_self"), IF( AND( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , 'None') , ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , 'Approved') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Term_Exception_Approval_Status__c , 'None') , ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Term_Exception_Approval_Status__c , 'Approved') ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Ready for Signatures") ) ), ( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Signature Declined") ) ) ), OR( NOT(INCLUDES(Included_Product_Lines__c,'Workforce Verification')), AND( INCLUDES(Included_Product_Lines__c,'Workforce Verification'), Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.ACIC_Request_Approved__c ) ), IF( OR(Record_Type_Name__c ="Community Update Pack",Record_Type_Name__c ="MSA & Service Schedule"), IF( AND( OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.Type)), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.Type, "Existing Customer") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Method_of_Payment__c,"Charge Account"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Method_of_Payment__c,"Charge Account + Sub Account") ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c,"Approved")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c,"Auto-Approved")) ) ),FALSE, IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.Type, "New Customer"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Method_of_Payment__c,"") , AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Method_of_Payment__c,"Charge Account"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Method_of_Payment__c,"Charge Account + Sub Account") ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c,"Approved")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPComply__RelatedProposalId__r.APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c,"Auto-Approved")) ) ) ) ),FALSE,TRUE) ), TRUE) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/AdobeSignApttus?Id="&Id&"&keyContact="&Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.KeyContact__c&"&ownerId="&Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.OwnerId, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__eSignature","Send For eSignatures"), "_self"), NULL ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For new Customer, Contract can only be presented if user requests for New Account Type on Proposal.
CustomField.label: Compile and Send for Adobe eSignatures
